
# WePay 
![wepay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/wepay/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `wepay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] WePay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  WePay is a payments API company that has built its API specifically for platform businesses like marketplaces, crowdfunding sites and small business software. These platforms are empowering millions of users worldwide to unlock all kinds of creative commerce. Through its proprietary Veda social risk engine, WePay gives platforms a flexible payments API that provides a great user experience while still being able to take on all their fraud risk and compliance burdens.Â  WePay has processed transactions for more than 200,000 customers and 280+ partners. Platform businesses such as GoFundMe, HoneyFund, Fundly, CustomMade, Care.com and LessAccounting have chosen WePay's API to handle their payments. The company's customer service team won the 2013 Gold Stevie Award for its outstanding work with customers  
 
 
**Countries:** 
 
:	![UM](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/um.svg#w24)  
**Address:** 
street:  United States of America
